org.gnocchigames.dragonboat.entities

Class Boat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gnocchigames.dragonboat.entities.Entity
      • org.gnocchigames.dragonboat.entities.Boat
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIBoat, PlayerBoat

    public class Boat
extends Entity
    Class which implements a boat It is not designed to be used directly, instead please use PlayerBoat or AIBoat
